description:
The Maou of Earth. A businessman who owns several prosperous companies and is even called "the Maou in the business world" and "The Mazoku who looks like a movie star" by Shibuya Miko. He met Yuuri and Shouri when they were children and saved them from some bullies. His ancestor was Christel Wincott, who brought "The Mirror at the Bottom of the Sea" from Shin Makoku to Earth. He was the last keeper of the box, before he entrusted it to Yuuri, who took it back with him to Shin Makoku.
Bob hates to have any semblance of home life in his office and so his workers have to wash the dishes in a bathtub and he also does not keep tissues in his office.
name: Bob
